Six Degrees is a psycho-sensory brand-building agency. We use psychology-based principles to gain deeper insights into what customers think and feel. We then use sensory techniques to ensure our brand and marketing strategies are effective verbally and across all appropriate senses.  Six Degrees provides advertising, brand development and marketing services to clients with national or multinational brands. Innovative brand development techniques leverage the appropriate sensory information to connect with the brand's target audience. We create tools so companies can "live" their brands for greater success.

One of the leading brand consultanting firms combining brand strategy and analysis with the entrepreneurial and creative spirit of online branding and design. Provided the company has an array of consulting services that guide clients in the brand creation, enhancement, maintenance and valuation of their most valuable asset -- their brands (online and offline).

Pfizer is the world's largest research-based biomedical and pharmaceutical company. A Pfizer market analyst manager providing medical marketing and research to help the mission of people living longer, healthier lives.

A leader in global market research deliver insightful, fact-based information to customers, markets and employees. Instrumental in providing an innovative blend of marketing research, analytical expertise, creative thinking, and substantive knowledge for companies and industries, helping to you make better business decisions, especially when it comes to branding.

Combination of basic psychology research on human perception and research on the intersection of human perception and automotive technology, including sensory perceptions and the ability to use advanced technology features in real-world driving.
Experimental research into human cognition, including time perception, changes in time perception associated with aging and the role and effectiveness of scents in human perception and memory.
Experimental research into human cognition, including time perception, changes in time perception associated with aging and the role and effectiveness of scents in human perception and memory.
Core psychology curriculum with an emphasis on cognitive processes and information processing.

summary: Psychologist turned marketing executive who has extensive branding experience (online and offline) and helping clients launch new brands and revitalize existing ones, both domestically and internationally. A brand builder who takes an unconventional approach to branding. As the CEO of Six Degrees, our brand experts are your team from market research to implementation to results: We are focused not on what we hear but on what it means for the brand. As a result, we design and deliver the kind of brand planning, strategy and research that companies need most, including online branding with social marketing. Insightful, actionable, one-of-a-kind. Loves good food, fine wine and interesting conversation. Enjoys scuba diving and international travel. Doesn't have a desk in his office but hasn't succeeded in getting rid of the office.Specialties: advertising, medical online branding, brand profitability, brand web site design, online marketing, online branding, sensory branding, insight mining, brand cascading, experiential brandingbrand research and strategy; social marketing, print, interactive, packaging and broadcast creative, brand visualization, marketing consulting
name: Frank Schab
title: Building stronger brands for clients by applying psychological principles and sensory techniques
